Name: Blue Bird
About the game: Blue Bird is a Visual Novel following the lives of four youths. The protagonist, Karin, lost someone very dear to him in his childhood… Yet thanks to fate, he meets a young girl who will change his empty life and give it meaning. Be a part of this love story and help lead Karin to a bright future! ์Note before buy - This game is still in development. - After you purchased a bluebird. You'll gain access to a full game ( 5 Episodes ) and doesn't require to buy any ' Season Pass '. Just buy and wait another episode come out and play it!! And Steam Trading Cards will Coming Soon!!!
